entrypoints.name: step
entrypoints.buildCommand: mkdir -p build && RUST_LOG=debug cargo run --package zk-tendermint --bin step --release build && mv ./target/release/step ./build/step

entrypoints.name: skip
entrypoints.buildCommand: mkdir -p build && RUST_LOG=debug cargo run --package zk-tendermint --bin skip --release build && mv ./target/release/skip ./build/skip

entrypoints.name: data_commitment
entrypoints.buildCommand: mkdir -p build && RUST_LOG=debug cargo run --package blobstream --bin data_commitment --release build && mv ./target/release/data_commitment ./build/data_commitment

entrypoints.name: combined_step
entrypoints.buildCommand: mkdir -p build && RUST_LOG=debug cargo run --package blobstream --bin combined_step --release build && mv ./target/release/combined_step ./build/combined_step

entrypoints.name: combined_skip
entrypoints.buildCommand: mkdir -p build && RUST_LOG=debug cargo run --package blobstream --bin combined_skip --release build && mv ./target/release/combined_skip ./build/combined_skip
